function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unequal distribution of wealth and resources leading to socioeconomic disparities","Impact":"Increased likelihood of contagious diseases in areas with lower socioeconomic development","Mitigation":"Implement targeted healthcare interventions and access to healthcare services in underprivileged areas","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile healthcare units, community health workers","People":"Residents of underprivileged areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Adoption of digital tools in areas with higher socioeconomic development","Impact":"Limited access to digital healthcare resources and information in underprivileged areas","Mitigation":"Invest in digital infrastructure and training programs to improve access to digital tools in underprivileged areas","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile healthcare apps, teleconsultation platforms","People":"Residents of underprivileged areas","Owner":"Government, technology companies"}]}
